datenguideR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

dg_call

dg_call.Rd

Makes a call to the Datenguide GraphQL API and returns the results.

dg_call(region_id = NULL, stat_name = NULL, year = NULL,
  substat_name = NULL, parameter = NULL, ipp = 150, nuts_nr = NULL,
  lau_nr = NULL, parent_chr = NULL, full_descriptions = FALSE,
  page_nr = NULL, long_format = T)

Arguments

region_id

description
stat_name

description
year

description
substat_name

description
parameter

description
ipp

description
nuts_nr

description
lau_nr

description
parent_chr

description
full_descriptions

description
page_nr

description
long_format

description

Value

Data frame containing the requested data

Examples

dg_call(region_id = "11",
   year = c(2001, 2007),
   stat_name = "BETR08",
   substat_name = 'TIERA8',
   parameter = c("TIERART2", "TIERART3"))
#> # A tibble: 4 x 12
#>   id    name   year TIERA8 GENESIS_source GENESIS_source_~ param_name stat_name
#>   <chr> <chr> <int>  <int> <chr>          <chr>            <chr>      <chr>    
#> 1 11    Berl~  2001      8 Allgemeine Ag~ 41120            TIERART2   BETR08   
#> 2 11    Berl~  2001      7 Allgemeine Ag~ 41120            TIERART3   BETR08   
#> 3 11    Berl~  2007     11 Allgemeine Ag~ 41120            TIERART2   BETR08   
#> 4 11    Berl~  2007      5 Allgemeine Ag~ 41120            TIERART3   BETR08   
#> # ... with 4 more variables: stat_description <chr>, substat_name <chr>,
#> #   substat_description <chr>, param_description <chr>
